newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian share trade down, Salacgriva active.
newsitem.headline: Latvian share trade down, Salacgriva active.

text.p: The turnover of Latvian shares fell on Wednesday with the Salacgriva 95 fish cannery on the secondary list the most traded share on the market.
Overall stock turnover fell to 59,738 lats from 82,203 lats. Salacgriva 95 had the highest volume on 19,062 lats but remained unchanged at 2.30 lats.
On the official list, leading bank Unibanka turned over 12,172 lats, a fall against Tuesday's 50,760, but climbed two santimes to 2.42 lats.
Other official list shares continued quiet. Riga Transport Fleet turned over 1,198 lats and gained three santimes to 0.99.
The Staburadze confectionery firm was stable at two lats on a tiny 560 lats volume.

Amid other secondary market shares, Daugavpils Chain was active on trade of 8,616 lats and rose one santime to 1.15 lats while Riga Yeast saw activity of 6,020 lats and rose to 3.01 lats from three lats.
Lode brick factory had turnover of 3,502 lats and it gained two santimes to 1.05 lats.
